entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
